donations.header: Together, We Can Heal the World's Hardest-Hit Communities
donations.subtitle: Your support provides education, humanitarian aid, and a new beginning for those displaced by disaster and conflict.
donations.whyDesc1: At Savannah United Berlin e.V., we believe that humanity knows no borders. Whether it is protecting our neighbors in Berlin-Brandenburg during a bitter winter or rebuilding lives for those fleeing conflict in Northeastern Nigeria, we are on the front lines.
donations.whyStrong: But we cannot do it alone.
donations.whyProviding: When you donate today, you aren't just giving money; you are providing:
donations.impactEdu: Education: Giving children in Nigeria the tools to dream beyond the classroom.
donations.impactRelief: Emergency Relief: Providing food, warmth, and shelter to the homeless in Berlin.
donations.impactResettlement: Resettlement: Helping families displaced by Boko Haram find safety and dignity once again.
donations.tier25: Provides a 'Winter Kit' (socks, gloves, and warm meals) for a homeless person in Berlin.
donations.tier50: Covers educational materials and school supplies for three students in Nigeria.
donations.tier100: Supports the resettlement of a displaced family with essential household supplies.
donations.tierCustom: Every Euro goes directly toward our mission of socio-economic integration.
donations.bankDesc: You can support our ongoing projects by making a direct bank transfer to our official NGO account.
donations.receiptDesc1: After completing your transfer, please send a screenshot or PDF of your transfer receipt to our official WhatsApp.
donations.receiptDesc2: Once our team verifies the transfer, your contribution will be added to the live donation counter above!
donations.securityNote: Your data is processed securely and confidentially.
donations.trustNote: "We are committed to direct action. Through our partnerships in Nigeria and Germany, we ensure your contribution reaches the hands of those who need it most, with full transparency and passion."
